substreams.name: veOCEAN
substreams.description: Earn rewards by locking OCEAN and holding veOCEAN. The longer you hold, the more you earn.

substreams.name: Volume DF
substreams.description: Earn rewards by allocating veOCEAN to high-DCV assets; or delegating veOCEAN to market curators.

substreams.name: Challenge DF
substreams.description: Earn rewards by participating and submitting predictions to the weekly challenge.
